Text.Page:
This hall needs to show off our prowess.

In order for our alliance to let the world know of its power, we need you to kill a very challenging monster and bring a trophy back I can display in the hall.

What can you hunt? Take your pick.

Balder's Temple (Normal)—{@linkcreature:425#8005#Auricadis}
Balder’s Temple (1 person)—{@linkcreature:825#6000#Nightmare Glaciernus}
Argon Core—{@linkcreature:426#20000#Meldita}
Manaya's Core—{@linkcreature:727#2007#Shandra Manaya}

Thank you.

Displaying this trophy will show the Iron Order to be the greatest power.

, we appreciate your help. Thank you.
